attributes.action: formulate with the Insurance Industry, a disaster kitty funded from a small levy on all insurances, that can be released to claimants suffering from flood, explosion, fire etc. once declared a 'disaster' by the Government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This system exists in France and means that immediate relief can be issued to victims of floods, disasters and events such as Buncefield fuel depot without having to wait an unreasonable time before they can start to get their life back together.
